00104     __host__ __device__
00105     inline complex<ValueType> operator*(const ValueType& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs);

00146   // Transcendentals:
00147   // Returns the complex cosine of z.
00148   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> cos(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00149   // Returns the complex hyperbolic cosine of z.
00150   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> cosh(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00151   // Returns the complex base e exponential of z.
00152   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> exp(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00153   // Returns the complex natural logarithm of z.
00154   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> log(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00155   // Returns the complex base 10 logarithm of z.
00156   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> log10(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00157   // Returns z to the n'th power.
00158   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> pow(const complex<ValueType>& z, const int& n);
00159   // Returns z to the x'th power.
00160   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> pow(const complex<ValueType>&z, const ValueType&x);
00161   // Returns z to the z2'th power.
00162   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> pow(const complex<ValueType>&z, 
00163                                                           const complex<ValueType>&z2);
00164   // Returns x to the z'th power.
00165   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> pow(const ValueType& x, const complex<ValueType>& z);
00166   // Returns the complex sine of z.
00167   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> sin(const complex<ValueType>&z);
00168   // Returns the complex hyperbolic sine of z.
00169   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> sinh(const complex<ValueType>&z);
00170   // Returns the complex square root of z.
00171   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> sqrt(const complex<ValueType>&z);
00172   // Returns the complex tangent of z.
00173   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> tan(const complex<ValueType>&z);
00174   // Returns the complex hyperbolic tangent of z.
00175   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> tanh(const complex<ValueType>&z);
00176 
00177 
00178   // Inverse Trigonometric:
00179   // Returns the complex arc cosine of z.
00180   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> acos(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00181   // Returns the complex arc sine of z.
00182   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> asin(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00183   // Returns the complex arc tangent of z.
00184   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> atan(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00185   // Returns the complex hyperbolic arc cosine of z.
00186   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> acosh(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00187   // Returns the complex hyperbolic arc sine of z.
00188   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> asinh(const complex<ValueType>& z);
00189   // Returns the complex hyperbolic arc tangent of z.
00190   template<typename ValueType> complex<ValueType> atanh(const complex<ValueType>& z);

00194   // Stream operators:
00195   template<typename ValueType,class charT, class traits>
00196     std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& os, const complex<ValueType>& z);
00197   template<typename ValueType, typename charT, class traits>
00198     std::basic_istream<charT, traits>&
00199     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& is, complex<ValueType>& z);
00200   
00201 
00202   // Stream operators
00203   template<typename ValueType,class charT, class traits>
00204     std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& os, const complex<ValueType>& z)
00205     {
00206       os << '(' << z.real() << ',' << z.imag() << ')';
00207       return os;
00208     };
00209 
00210   template<typename ValueType, typename charT, class traits>
00211     std::basic_istream<charT, traits>&
00212     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& is, complex<ValueType>& z)
00213     {
00214       ValueType re, im;
00215 
00216       charT ch;
00217       is >> ch;
00218 
00219       if(ch == '(')
00220       {
00221         is >> re >> ch;
00222         if (ch == ',')
00223         {
00224           is >> im >> ch;
00225           if (ch == ')')
00226           {
00227             z = complex<ValueType>(re, im);
00228           }
00229           else
00230           {
00231             is.setstate(std::ios_base::failbit);
00232           }
00233         }
00234         else if (ch == ')')
00235         {
00236           z = re;
00237         }
00238         else
00239         {
00240           is.setstate(std::ios_base::failbit);
00241         }
00242       }
00243       else
00244       {
00245         is.putback(ch);
00246         is >> re;
00247         z = re;
00248       }
00249       return is;
00250     }

00252 template <typename T>
00253   struct norm_type {
00254     typedef T type; 
00255   };
00256  template <typename T>
00257    struct norm_type< complex<T> > { 
00258    typedef T type;
00259  };
00260   
00261 template <typename ValueType>
00262 struct complex
00263 {
00264 public:
00265   typedef ValueType value_type;
00266 
00267   // Constructors
00268   __host__ __device__      
00269     inline complex<ValueType>(const ValueType & re = ValueType(), const ValueType& im = ValueType())
00270     {
00271       real(re);
00272       imag(im);
00273     }  
00274 
00275   template <class X> 
00276     __host__ __device__
00277     inline complex<ValueType>(const complex<X> & z)
00278     {
00279       real(z.real());
00280       imag(z.imag());
00281     }  
00282   
00283   template <class X> 
00284     __host__ __device__
00285     inline complex<ValueType>(const std::complex<X> & z)
00286     {
00287       real(z.real());
00288       imag(z.imag());
00289     }  
00290 
00291   template <typename T>
00292     __host__ __device__
00293     inline complex<ValueType>& operator=(const complex<T> z)
00294     {
00295       real(z.real());
00296       imag(z.imag());
00297       return *this;
00298     }
00299 
00300   __host__ __device__
00301     inline complex<ValueType>& operator+=(const complex<ValueType> z)
00302     {
00303       real(real()+z.real());
00304       imag(imag()+z.imag());
00305       return *this;
00306     }
00307 
00308   __host__ __device__
00309     inline complex<ValueType>& operator-=(const complex<ValueType> z)
00310     {
00311       real(real()-z.real());
00312       imag(imag()-z.imag());
00313       return *this;
00314     }
00315 
00316   __host__ __device__
00317     inline complex<ValueType>& operator*=(const complex<ValueType> z)
00318     {
00319       *this = *this * z;
00320       return *this;
00321     }
00322 
00323   __host__ __device__
00324     inline complex<ValueType>& operator/=(const complex<ValueType> z)
00325     {
00326       *this = *this / z;
00327       return *this;
00328     }
00329 
00330   __host__ __device__ inline ValueType real() const volatile;
00331   __host__ __device__ inline ValueType imag() const volatile;
00332   __host__ __device__ inline ValueType real() const;
00333   __host__ __device__ inline ValueType imag() const;
00334   __host__ __device__ inline void real(ValueType) volatile;
00335   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(ValueType) volatile;
00336   __host__ __device__ inline void real(ValueType);
00337   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(ValueType);
00338 };

00343 template<>
00344 struct complex <float> : public cuFloatComplex
00345 {
00346 public:
00347   typedef float value_type;
00348   __host__ __device__ 
00349     inline  complex<float>(){};
00350   __host__ __device__ 
00351     inline  complex<float>(const float & re, const float& im = float())
00352     {
00353       real(re);
00354       imag(im);
00355     }  
00356 
00357   // For some reason having the following constructor
00358   // explicitly makes things faster with at least g++
00359   __host__ __device__
00360     complex<float>(const complex<float> & z)
00361     : cuFloatComplex(z){}
00362 
00363   __host__ __device__
00364     complex<float>(cuFloatComplex z)
00365     : cuFloatComplex(z){}
00366   
00367   template <class X> 
00368     inline complex<float>(const std::complex<X> & z)
00369     {
00370       real(z.real());
00371       imag(z.imag());
00372     }  
00373 
00374   // Member operators
00375   template <typename T>
00376     __host__ __device__
00377     inline volatile complex<float>& operator=(const complex<T> z) volatile
00378     {
00379       real(z.real());
00380       imag(z.imag());
00381       return *this;
00382     }
00383 
00384   template <typename T>
00385     __host__ __device__
00386     inline complex<float>& operator=(const complex<T> z)
00387     {
00388       real(z.real());
00389       imag(z.imag());
00390       return *this;
00391     }
00392 
00393   __host__ __device__ 
00394     inline complex<float>& operator+=(const complex<float> z)
00395     {
00396       real(real()+z.real());
00397       imag(imag()+z.imag());
00398       return *this;
00399     }
00400 
00401   __host__ __device__ 
00402     inline complex<float>& operator-=(const complex<float> z)
00403     {
00404       real(real()-z.real());
00405       imag(imag()-z.imag());
00406       return *this;
00407     }
00408 
00409   __host__ __device__ 
00410     inline complex<float>& operator*=(const complex<float> z)
00411     {
00412       *this = *this * z;
00413       return *this;
00414     }
00415 
00416   __host__ __device__ 
00417     inline complex<float>& operator/=(const complex<float> z)
00418     {
00419       *this = *this / z;
00420       return *this;
00421     }
00422 
00423   // Let the compiler synthesize the copy and assignment operators.
00424   __host__ __device__ inline complex<float>(const volatile complex<float> & z)
00425   {
00426     real(z.real());
00427     imag(z.imag());
00428   }
00429 
00430   __host__ __device__ inline float real() const volatile{ return x; }
00431   __host__ __device__ inline float imag() const volatile{ return y; }
00432   __host__ __device__ inline float real() const{ return x; }
00433   __host__ __device__ inline float imag() const{ return y; }
00434   __host__ __device__ inline void real(float re)volatile{ x = re; }
00435   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(float im)volatile{ y = im; }
00436   __host__ __device__ inline void real(float re){ x = re; }
00437   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(float im){ y = im; }
00438 
00439   // cast operators
00440   __host__ __device__ inline operator float() const { return real(); }
00441   inline operator std::complex<float>() const { return std::complex<float>(real(),imag()); }
00442 };
00443 
00444 template<>
00445 struct complex <double> : public cuDoubleComplex
00446 {
00447 public:
00448   typedef double value_type;
00449   __host__ __device__
00450     inline  complex<double>(){};
00451   __host__ __device__
00452     inline complex<double>(const double & re, const double& im = double())
00453     {
00454       real(re);
00455       imag(im);
00456     }
00457 
00458   // For some reason having the following constructor
00459   // explicitly makes things faster with at least g++
00460   __host__ __device__
00461     inline complex<double>(const complex<double> & z)
00462     : cuDoubleComplex(z) {}
00463 
00464   __host__ __device__
00465     inline complex<double>(cuDoubleComplex z)
00466     : cuDoubleComplex(z) {}
00467 
00468   template <class X> 
00469     inline complex<double>(const std::complex<X> & z)
00470     {
00471       real(z.real());
00472       imag(z.imag());
00473     }  
00474 
00475   // Member operators
00476   template <typename T>
00477     __host__ __device__
00478     inline volatile complex<double>& operator=(const complex<T> z) volatile
00479     {
00480       real(z.real());
00481       imag(z.imag());
00482       return *this;
00483     }
00484 
00485   template <typename T>
00486     __host__ __device__
00487     inline complex<double>& operator=(const complex<T> z)
00488     {
00489       real(z.real());
00490       imag(z.imag());
00491       return *this;
00492     }
00493 
00494   __host__ __device__
00495     inline complex<double>& operator+=(const complex<double> z)
00496     {
00497       real(real()+z.real());
00498       imag(imag()+z.imag());
00499       return *this;
00500     }
00501 
00502   __host__ __device__
00503     inline complex<double>& operator-=(const complex<double> z)
00504     {
00505       real(real()-z.real());
00506       imag(imag()-z.imag());
00507       return *this;
00508     }
00509 
00510   __host__ __device__
00511     inline complex<double>& operator*=(const complex<double> z)
00512     {
00513       *this = *this * z;
00514       return *this;
00515     }
00516 
00517   __host__ __device__
00518     inline complex<double>& operator/=(const complex<double> z)
00519     {
00520       *this = *this / z;
00521       return *this;
00522     }
00523 
00524   __host__ __device__ inline complex<double>(const volatile complex<double> & z)
00525   {
00526     real(z.real());
00527     imag(z.imag());
00528   }
00529 
00530   // Let the compiler synthesize the copy and assignment operators.
00531   __host__ __device__ inline double real() const volatile { return x; }
00532   __host__ __device__ inline double imag() const volatile { return y; }
00533   __host__ __device__ inline double real() const { return x; }
00534   __host__ __device__ inline double imag() const { return y; }
00535   __host__ __device__ inline void real(double re)volatile{ x = re; }
00536   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(double im)volatile{ y = im; }
00537   __host__ __device__ inline void real(double re){ x = re; }
00538   __host__ __device__ inline void imag(double im){ y = im; }
00539 
00540   // cast operators
00541   __host__ __device__ inline operator double() const { return real(); }
00542   inline operator std::complex<double>() const { return std::complex<double>(real(),imag()); }
00543 };

00547   // Binary arithmetic operations
00548   // At the moment I'm implementing the basic functions, and the 
00549   // corresponding cuComplex calls are commented.
00550 
00551   template<typename ValueType>
00552     __host__ __device__ 
00553     inline complex<ValueType> operator+(const complex<ValueType>& lhs,
00554                                             const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00555     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()+rhs.real(),lhs.imag()+rhs.imag());
00556     //  return cuCaddf(lhs,rhs);
00557   }
00558 
00559   template<typename ValueType>
00560     __host__ __device__ 
00561     inline complex<ValueType> operator+(const volatile complex<ValueType>& lhs,
00562                                             const volatile complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00563     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()+rhs.real(),lhs.imag()+rhs.imag());
00564     //  return cuCaddf(lhs,rhs);
00565   }
00566 
00567   template <typename ValueType> 
00568     __host__ __device__ 
00569     inline complex<ValueType> operator+(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const ValueType & rhs){
00570     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()+rhs,lhs.imag());
00571     //  return cuCaddf(lhs,complex<ValueType>(rhs));
00572   }
00573   template <typename ValueType> 
00574     __host__ __device__ 
00575     inline complex<ValueType> operator+(const ValueType& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00576     return complex<ValueType>(rhs.real()+lhs,rhs.imag());
00577     //  return cuCaddf(complex<float>(lhs),rhs);
00578   }
00579 
00580   template <typename ValueType> 
00581     __host__ __device__ 
00582     inline complex<ValueType> operator-(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00583     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()-rhs.real(),lhs.imag()-rhs.imag());
00584     //  return cuCsubf(lhs,rhs);
00585   }
00586   template <typename ValueType> 
00587     __host__ __device__
00588     inline complex<ValueType> operator-(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const ValueType & rhs){
00589     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()-rhs,lhs.imag());
00590     //  return cuCsubf(lhs,complex<float>(rhs));
00591   }
00592   template <typename ValueType> 
00593     __host__ __device__
00594     inline complex<ValueType> operator-(const ValueType& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00595     return complex<ValueType>(lhs-rhs.real(),-rhs.imag());
00596     //  return cuCsubf(complex<float>(lhs),rhs);
00597   }
00598 
00599   template <typename ValueType> 
00600     __host__ __device__
00601     inline complex<ValueType> operator*(const complex<ValueType>& lhs,
00602                                             const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00603     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()*rhs.real()-lhs.imag()*rhs.imag(),
00604                                   lhs.real()*rhs.imag()+lhs.imag()*rhs.real());
00605     //  return cuCmulf(lhs,rhs);
00606   }
00607 
00608   template <typename ValueType> 
00609     __host__ __device__
00610     inline complex<ValueType> operator*(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const ValueType & rhs){
00611     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()*rhs,lhs.imag()*rhs);
00612     //  return cuCmulf(lhs,complex<float>(rhs));
00613   }
00614 
00615   template <typename ValueType> 
00616     __host__ __device__
00617     inline complex<ValueType> operator*(const ValueType& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00618     return complex<ValueType>(rhs.real()*lhs,rhs.imag()*lhs);
00619     //  return cuCmulf(complex<float>(lhs),rhs);
00620   }
00621 
00622 
00623   template <typename ValueType>
00624     __host__ __device__
00625     inline complex<ValueType> operator/(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00626     const ValueType cross_norm  =  lhs.real() * rhs.real() + lhs.imag() * rhs.imag();
00627     const ValueType rhs_norm = norm(rhs);
00628     return complex<ValueType>(cross_norm/rhs_norm,
00629                                   (lhs.imag() * rhs.real() - lhs.real() * rhs.imag()) / rhs_norm);
00630   }
00631 
00632   template <>
00633     __host__ __device__
00634     inline complex<float> operator/(const complex<float>& lhs, const complex<float>& rhs){
00635     return cuCdivf(lhs,rhs);
00636   }
00637 
00638   template <>
00639     __host__ __device__
00640     inline complex<double> operator/(const complex<double>& lhs, const complex<double>& rhs){
00641     return cuCdiv(lhs,rhs);
00642   }
00643 
00644   template <typename ValueType> 
00645     __host__ __device__
00646     inline complex<ValueType> operator/(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const ValueType & rhs){
00647     return complex<ValueType>(lhs.real()/rhs,lhs.imag()/rhs);
00648     //  return cuCdivf(lhs,complex<float>(rhs));
00649   }
00650 
00651   template <typename ValueType>
00652     __host__ __device__
00653     inline complex<ValueType> operator/(const ValueType& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00654     const ValueType cross_norm  =  lhs * rhs.real();
00655     const ValueType rhs_norm = norm(rhs);
00656     return complex<ValueType>(cross_norm/rhs_norm,(-lhs.real() * rhs.imag()) / rhs_norm);
00657   }
00658 
00659   template <>
00660     __host__ __device__
00661     inline complex<float> operator/(const float& lhs, const complex<float>& rhs){
00662     return cuCdivf(complex<float>(lhs),rhs);
00663   }
00664   template <>
00665     __host__ __device__
00666     inline complex<double> operator/(const double& lhs, const complex<double>& rhs){
00667     return cuCdiv(complex<double>(lhs),rhs);
00668   }

00673     __host__ __device__
00674     inline complex<ValueType> operator+(const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00675     return rhs;
00676   }
00677   template <typename ValueType> 
00678     __host__ __device__
00679     inline complex<ValueType> operator-(const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00680     return rhs*-ValueType(1);

00683   // Equality operators 
00684   template <typename ValueType> 
00685     __host__ __device__
00686     inline bool operator==(const complex<ValueType>& lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00687     if(lhs.real() == rhs.real() && lhs.imag() == rhs.imag()){
00688       return true;
00689     }
00690     return false;
00691   }
00692   template <typename ValueType> 
00693     __host__ __device__
00694     inline bool operator==(const ValueType & lhs, const complex<ValueType>& rhs){
00695     if(lhs == rhs.real() && rhs.imag() == 0){
00696       return true;
00697     }
00698     return false;
00699   }
00700   template <typename ValueType> 
00701     __host__ __device__
00702     inline bool operator==(const complex<ValueType> & lhs, const ValueType& rhs){
00703     if(lhs.real() == rhs && lhs.imag() == 0){
00704       return true;
00705     }
00706     return false;
00707   }

00718     return !(lhs == rhs);

00730     inline complex<ValueType> conj(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00731     return complex<ValueType>(z.real(),-z.imag());

00753     return atan2(z.imag(),z.real());

00766   template <typename ValueType>
00767     __host__ __device__
00768     inline ValueType norm(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00769     return z.real()*z.real() + z.imag()*z.imag();
00770   }

00772   template <typename ValueType>
00773     __host__ __device__
00774     inline complex<ValueType> polar(const ValueType & m, const ValueType & theta){ 
00775     return complex<ValueType>(m * ::cos(theta),m * ::sin(theta));
00776   }

00779     __host__ __device__
00780     inline complex<float> polar(const float & magnitude, const float & angle){ 
00781     return complex<float>(magnitude * ::cosf(angle),magnitude * ::sinf(angle));
00782   }

00787     return complex<double>(magnitude * ::cos(angle),magnitude * ::sin(angle));
00788   }

00790   // Transcendental functions implementation
00791   template <typename ValueType>
00792     __host__ __device__
00793     inline complex<ValueType> cos(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00794     const ValueType re = z.real();
00795     const ValueType im = z.imag();
00796     return complex<ValueType>(::cos(re) * ::cosh(im), -::sin(re) * ::sinh(im));
00797   }
00798 
00799   template <>
00800     __host__ __device__
00801     inline complex<float> cos(const complex<float>& z){
00802     const float re = z.real();
00803     const float im = z.imag();
00804     return complex<float>(cosf(re) * coshf(im), -sinf(re) * sinhf(im));
00805   }
00806 
00807   template <typename ValueType>
00808     __host__ __device__
00809     inline complex<ValueType> cosh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00810     const ValueType re = z.real();
00811     const ValueType im = z.imag();
00812     return complex<ValueType>(::cosh(re) * ::cos(im), ::sinh(re) * ::sin(im));
00813   }
00814 
00815   template <>
00816     __host__ __device__
00817     inline complex<float> cosh(const complex<float>& z){
00818     const float re = z.real();
00819     const float im = z.imag();
00820     return complex<float>(::coshf(re) * ::cosf(im), ::sinhf(re) * ::sinf(im));
00821   }

00851     inline complex<ValueType> log10(const complex<ValueType>& z){ 
00852     // Using the explicit literal prevents compile time warnings in
00853     // devices that don't support doubles 
00854     return log(z)/ValueType(2.30258509299404568402);
00855     //    return log(z)/ValueType(::log(10.0));

00888   template <typename ValueType>
00889     __host__ __device__
00890     inline complex<ValueType> sin(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00891     const ValueType re = z.real();
00892     const ValueType im = z.imag();
00893     return complex<ValueType>(::sin(re) * ::cosh(im), ::cos(re) * ::sinh(im));
00894   }
00895 
00896   template <>
00897     __host__ __device__
00898     inline complex<float> sin(const complex<float>& z){
00899     const float re = z.real();
00900     const float im = z.imag();
00901     return complex<float>(::sinf(re) * ::coshf(im), ::cosf(re) * ::sinhf(im));
00902   }

00904   template <typename ValueType>
00905     __host__ __device__
00906     inline complex<ValueType> sinh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00907     const ValueType re = z.real();
00908     const ValueType im = z.imag();
00909     return complex<ValueType>(::sinh(re) * ::cos(im), ::cosh(re) * ::sin(im));
00910   }

00916     const float im = z.imag();
00917     return complex<float>(::sinhf(re) * ::cosf(im), ::coshf(re) * ::sinf(im));

00923     return polar(::sqrt(abs(z)),arg(z)/ValueType(2));
00924   }

00928     inline complex<float> sqrt(const complex<float>& z){
00929     return polar(::sqrtf(abs(z)),arg(z)/float(2));
00930   }

00932   template <typename ValueType>
00933     __host__ __device__
00934     inline complex<ValueType> tan(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00935     return sin(z)/cos(z);
00936   }
00937 
00938   template <typename ValueType>
00939     __host__ __device__
00940     inline complex<ValueType> tanh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00941     // This implementation seems better than the simple sin/cos
00942     return (exp(ValueType(2)*z)-ValueType(1))/(exp(ValueType(2)*z)+ValueType(1));
00943     //    return sinh(z)/cosh(z);
00944   }

00946   // Inverse trigonometric functions implementation
00947 
00948   template <typename ValueType>
00949     __host__ __device__
00950     inline complex<ValueType> acos(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00951     const complex<ValueType> ret = asin(z);
00952     return complex<ValueType>(ValueType(M_PI/2.0) - ret.real(),-ret.imag());
00953   }
00954 
00955   template <typename ValueType>
00956     __host__ __device__
00957     inline complex<ValueType> asin(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00958     const complex<ValueType> i(0,1);
00959     return -i*asinh(i*z);
00960   }
00961 
00962   template <typename ValueType>
00963     __host__ __device__
00964     inline complex<ValueType> atan(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00965     const complex<ValueType> i(0,1);
00966     return -i*atanh(i*z);
00967   }
00968 
00969   template <typename ValueType>
00970     __host__ __device__
00971     inline complex<ValueType> acosh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00972     cusp::complex<ValueType> ret((z.real() - z.imag()) * (z.real() + z.imag()) - ValueType(1.0),
00973                                  ValueType(2.0) * z.real() * z.imag());    
00974     ret = sqrt(ret);
00975     if (z.real() < ValueType(0.0)){
00976       ret = -ret;
00977     }
00978     ret += z;
00979     ret = log(ret);
00980     if (ret.real() < ValueType(0.0)){
00981       ret = -ret;
00982     }
00983     return ret;
00984 
00985     /*
00986     cusp::complex<ValueType> ret = log(sqrt(z*z-ValueType(1))+z);
00987     if(ret.real() < 0){
00988       ret.real(-ret.real());
00989     }
00990     return ret;
00991     */
00992   }
00993 
00994   template <typename ValueType>
00995     __host__ __device__
00996     inline complex<ValueType> asinh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
00997     return log(sqrt(z*z+ValueType(1))+z);
00998   }
00999 
01000   template <typename ValueType>
01001     __host__ __device__
01002     inline complex<ValueType> atanh(const complex<ValueType>& z){
01003     ValueType imag2 = z.imag() *  z.imag();   
01004     ValueType n = ValueType(1.0) + z.real();
01005     n = imag2 + n * n;
01006 
01007     ValueType d = ValueType(1.0) - z.real();
01008     d = imag2 + d * d;
01009     complex<ValueType> ret(ValueType(0.25) * (::log(n) - ::log(d)),0);
01010 
01011     d = ValueType(1.0) -  z.real() * z.real() - imag2;
01012 
01013     ret.imag(ValueType(0.5) * ::atan2(ValueType(2.0) * z.imag(), d));
01014     return ret;
01015     //return (log(ValueType(1)+z)-log(ValueType(1)-z))/ValueType(2);
01016   }
01017 
01018   template <typename ValueType>
01019     __host__ __device__
01020     inline complex<float> atanh(const complex<float>& z){
01021         float imag2 = z.imag() *  z.imag();   
01022     float n = float(1.0) + z.real();
01023     n = imag2 + n * n;
01024 
01025     float d = float(1.0) - z.real();
01026     d = imag2 + d * d;
01027     complex<float> ret(float(0.25) * (::logf(n) - ::logf(d)),0);
01028 
01029     d = float(1.0) -  z.real() * z.real() - imag2;
01030 
01031     ret.imag(float(0.5) * ::atan2f(float(2.0) * z.imag(), d));
01032     return ret;
01033     //return (log(ValueType(1)+z)-log(ValueType(1)-z))/ValueType(2);
01034 
01035   }
